<link href=" https://venki.dev/notes/replicate-vs-fly"/>; <author>; <name>;venkii</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=venkii</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.notion.so/image/https%3A%2F%2Fprod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2。 amazonaws.com%2Fd3658b9a-e072-4310-bfa2-ac54e0c811ae%2F2a7ecdd4-639f-463e-994f-480aa282cec6%2FUntitled.png?table=block&id=f9f41cae-7075-4e98-8f60-3bdfac5ff4 1f&cache=v2" style="宽度: 220px ; height: 77px;" />;<br />;Replicate 受 GPU 任务青睐；Fly 在延迟方面表现出色。用户寻求经济高效、快速的无服务器 GPU。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#replicate- vs-fly-gpu-cold-start-latency" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39411748" target="_blank ">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;注意事项长时间运行的树莓派</stitle>; <id>;https://www.dzombak.com/blog/2023/12/Considerations-for-a-long-running-Raspberry-Pi.html</id>; <更新>; 2024-02-17T08：59：28.658318Z </更新>; <link href =“https://www.dzombak.com/blog/2023/12/Considerations-for-a-long-running-Raspberry-Pi.html "/>; <author>; <name>;ilikepi</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ilikepi</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章讨论了作者在以最少的干预长时间维护 Raspberry Pi 的经验，探索了潜在的问题和解决方案。它还暗示了未来关于该主题的更全面的指南。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#considerations-for-a-long-running-raspberry-pi" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39407631" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;“被盗”无线电塔失踪至少一年</stitle>; <id>;https://www.radiodiscussions.com/threads/wjlx-wjbe-and -werh-oh-my.769948/#post-6697751</id>; <更新>;2024-02-17T10:59:28.658695Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.radiodiscussions.com/threads /wjlx-wjbe-and-werh-oh-my.769948/#post-6697751"/>; <作者>; <名称>;LeoPanthera</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= LeoPanthera</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.radioworld.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/wjlx-logo.png" style= “宽度：220 像素；高度：84 像素；” />;<br />;本文讨论了在 WJLX 塔现场拍摄的视频，强调了其废弃状态以及 Big South Community Broadcasting 潜在的违规行为。该公司的违规行为还延伸至汉密尔顿的 90.1 新非通信许可证，这表明存在一种规避规则的模式。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#stolen-radio-tower-missing-for-at-least-a-year" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <id>;https://christine.website/blog/devrel/</id>; <updated>;2024-02-17T15:59:28.661316Z</updated>; <link href=" https://christine.website/blog/devrel/"/>; <author>; <name>;sea-gold</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sea-gold</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.xeiaso.net/file/christine-static/hero/coffee-pose.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;他转向 DevRel，在营销之外为开发者和公司架起桥梁。DevRel 建立信任、社区，而不仅仅是销售。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io /#what-devrel-means-to-me" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39411912" target="_blank ">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我们必须重新开始：从 Atom 到 Zed</stitle>; <id>;https://zed.dev/blog/we-have-to-start-over</id>; <updated>;2024-02-17T10:59:28.663598Z </更新>; <link href="https://zed.dev/blog/we-have-to-start-over"/>; <作者>; <name>;tosh</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=tosh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://zed.dev/api/og?title=We%20Have%20to %20Start%20Over:%20From%20Atom%20to%20Zed" style="宽度: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;本文与 Zed 的联合创始人深入讨论了他们的技术选择，强调了 Rust 在他们打造轻量级、强大且可扩展的编辑器的愿景中的重要性。他们分享了他们的想法从使用 Electron 与 Atom 开始的历程、他们在性能方面的挣扎，以及转向 Rust 如何使他们能够构建一个多线程、高性能的编辑器。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#we- have-to-start-over-from-atom-to-zed" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39408288" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text" >;Spnec 快速跟踪吕宋岛中部 ₱200B 太阳能发电场</stitle>; <id>;https://businessmirror.com.ph/2024/01/03/spnec-fast-tracks-p200-b-solar-farm-in -central-luzon/</id>; <更新>;2024-02-17T10:59:28.663961Z</更新>; <link href="https://businessmirror.com.ph/2024/01/03/spnec-fast -tracks-p200-b-solar-farm-in-central-luzon/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;doener</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=doener< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://businessmirror.com.ph/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/comp02-010324-80x50.jpg" style= “宽度：220px；高度：138px;" />;<br />;SP 新能源公司正在快速推进其耗资 2000 亿比索的 Terra Solar 项目，该项目被誉为世界上最大的太阳能发电场。中央吕宋岛项目预计将于 2026 年第一季度交付，将做出贡献菲律宾电网占 5%，总需求占 12%。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#spnec-fast-tracks-200b-solar-farm-in-central-luzon" target= "_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39408076" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; < /entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Stuffit – 30 年的文件压缩</stitle>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// www.stuffit.com/imgs/header-illustration.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 163px;" />;<br />;文章提到StuffIt 2010更新到版本14.0.1，需要x86用户提前卸载。还介绍了StuffIt 2009的补丁，支持在64位Windows上访问上下文菜单，尽管是 32 位应用程序。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#stuffit-30-years-of-file-compression" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>;
